trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> objects in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 代表集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref>中的物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The DataGridItemCollection class represents a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> objects, which in turn represent the data items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: DataGridItemCollection 類別表示的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>依次代表資料項目中的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>

trans-unit.source: To programmatically retrieve <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> objects from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control, use one of following methods: - Use the indexer to get a single <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object from the collection, using array notation.
trans-unit.target: 若要以程式設計方式擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>物件從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制，請使用下列方法之一:-使用索引子以取得單一<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>從使用陣列標記法的集合物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection.CopyTo%2A> method to copy the contents of the collection to a <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, which can then be used to get items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: -使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection.CopyTo%2A>方法，將複製集合的內容<xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>，這可以再用來從集合取得項目。</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection.CopyTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> interface, which can then be used to get items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: -使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>方法來建立<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>介面，然後可以用來從集合取得項目。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection.Count%2A> property specifies the total number of items in the collection and is commonly used to determine the upper bound of the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection.Count%2A>屬性集合中指定的項目總數，和通常用來判斷集合中的上限。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立和初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>的新執行個體使用這個建構函式

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"></xref> that contains the items with which to initialize the collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"> </xref> ，其中包含用來初始化集合的項目。

trans-unit.source: Copies all the items from this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"></xref> collection to the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, starting at the specified index in the <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 複製的所有項目從這個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"></xref>到指定的集合<xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>中指定索引處開始， <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to copy the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> collection into the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法的內容複製<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>集合配置到指定<xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>指定索引處開始，。</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `array` parameter must be a zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >`array`參數必須是以零為起始的<xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> that receives the copied items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始<xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>接收複製的項目從<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The first position in the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> to receive the copied contents.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的第一個位置<xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>接收複製的內容。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得數目<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref>集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the Count property to determine the number of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Count 屬性來判斷數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>中的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>

trans-unit.source: The Count property is commonly used when iterating through the collection to determine the upper bound of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Count 屬性通常用於逐一查看集合時決定集合的上限。

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 數目<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref>集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implemented object that contains all the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-實作物件，包含所有<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref>中的物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"></xref>集合。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to create a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implemented object that can be iterated through to get each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來建立<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-實作可以透過取得每個項目中反覆查看物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to get the item currently pointed to in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>取得的項目目前的屬性指向集合中。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move to the next item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>移至下一個項目，集合中的方法。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move the enumerator to its initial position.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，以將列舉值移到它的初始位置。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > After you create a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implemented object or use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection, you must call the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 建立之後<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-實作物件或使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，將列舉值移至第一個項目在集合中，您必須呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the item represented by the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 否則，項目會由<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>未定義屬性。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implemented object that contains all <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-實作物件，包含所有<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref>中的物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"></xref> collection can be modified.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref>中的物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"></xref>可以修改集合。

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `false` to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> collection can be written to in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性永遠傳回`false`表示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>集合可以在所有情況下寫入。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"></xref> collection is synchronized (thread-safe).
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否存取<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"></xref>集合同步 （安全執行緒）。

trans-unit.source: This property is derived from the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface and is overridden to always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性衍生自<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>介面，並覆寫成一律會傳回`false`。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection.IsSynchronized%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection.IsSynchronized%2A>屬性，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>介面。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection.IsSynchronized%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> object at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref>集合中指定索引處的物件。

trans-unit.source: Use this indexer to get a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> collection at the specified index, using array notation.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個索引子以取得<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>物件從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>集合中，使用陣列標記法指定索引處。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> to retrieve from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref>若要從集合中擷取。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"> </xref>集合中指定索引處。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得可用以同步存取的物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection"></xref>集合。

trans-unit.source: The object returned in this implementation is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> object itself.
trans-unit.target: 在此實作中傳回的物件是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>物件本身。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection.SyncRoot%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection.SyncRoot%2A>屬性，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>介面。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName>可用來對集合同步存取。
